title: Shifter Situations

The angel on my ass isn't as troublesome as the insane exes trying to steal and kill my mates.I'm about to become the girlfriend of nightmares.Situations within the shifter hierarchy have never been more tense.I'll make them worse before we can fix them together.There's two things I'm sure These predators aren't used to being the prey, and I'm Sloane f*****g King.The Third Devil of Hell,the High Coven Mistress of Vampyre,and the Druid's Princess.But don't let those titles fool you...I'm no damsel in distress.
